name: ott-platform-microservices
description: Netflix-style OTT Platform with Microservices Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:content" "npm run start:streaming" "npm run start:recommendation" "npm run start:common"
scripts.test:services: npm run test --prefix services/auth && npm run test --prefix services/user && npm run test --prefix services/content && npm run test --prefix services/common
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate --prefix services/auth && npm run migrate --prefix services/user && npm run migrate --prefix services/content && npm run migrate --prefix services/streaming && npm run migrate --prefix services/recommendation && npm run migrate --prefix services/common
scripts.seed: npm run seed --prefix services/auth && npm run seed --prefix services/user && npm run seed --prefix services/content && npm run seed --prefix services/streaming && npm run seed --prefix services/recommendation && npm run seed --prefix services/common
